title: justforwmz
author: justforwmz
created_time: January 02, 2023, 12:18:09 PMLast edit: February 04, 2023, 05:05:54 AM by justforwmz
content: Hello everyone,We are a legitimate business looking to purchase cryptocurrency (USDT, BTC, LTC) $8000 to $6000 Per Month and are willing to pay through verified PayPal. We are looking to establish a long-term partnership with a reliable seller. If you are a serious seller and interested in working with us, please contact us by DM.We can start small as trust builds we can do large amount this will ensure both parties interests.we are ready to deal with any well known ESCROW service I think that should address the trust issue.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: justforwmz on January 02, 2023, 12:18:09 PMWe can start small as trust builds we can do large amount this will ensure both parties interests.A scammer will first trade (for example) $50, $100, $200 or even $1000 first few days. They will build a good relation with you. One day you will send large amount of money for example $10k. You will not hear any response from them anymore. I think having a mentality of building trust for both parties are very risky for trading online.I will always, suggest to use escrow service when you are trading crypto currency online. There will be some fees but it's worth for the safety.

comments.author: Bitarock
comments.created_time: January 06, 2023, 04:26:27 AMLast edit: January 06, 2023, 07:32:46 AM by Bitarock
comments.body: I can do this or try and see how it goes. But you will need to send me the paypal money and then i buy btc. I would like a fee for my part so what do you say, Pm me  This not scam.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: Bitarock on January 06, 2023, 04:26:27 AMI can do this or try and see how it goes. But you will need to send me the paypal money and then i buy btc. I would like a fee for my part so what do you say,  Pm meNewbie dealing with newbie ? Either one will get scammed or both are scammers.Btw, your email id which you posted here (archive link), connects with an other account (Btcspot) [with a lot of negative trust by DT members] who posted the same address here (archive link). Meaning, both the accounts Btcspot and Bitarock are yours and you're a confirmed scammer!!PS: Nobody should deal with this user if you love your money.

comments.author: CryptoRollaOTC
comments.body: Quote from: justforwmz on January 02, 2023, 12:18:09 PMWe can start small as trust builds we can do large amount this will ensure both parties interests.This is a well-known trick that the famous and active Milangang with Europewide cover used when hunting their victims. In recent years, many traders, miners and businessmen have been robbed in this way in Europe, mainly in cash deals.

comments.author: justforwmz
comments.body: Hiwe are ready to deal with any well known ESCROW service I think that should address the trust issue.
